question: Your share your room with another student in the college hostel. You find it very difficult to study there because he or she always has parties and friends visiting. Write a letter to the hostel warden complaining about your displeasure with the room mate.
text: I am writing this letter to bring your attention to the problems I am facing in your hostel room. I have been living in room101 on the ground floor. Last month a new student came to share the space with me but he is disturbing me a lot.

To begin with, he organises parties every alternative day. Initially, I thought it would end in a few days but it is increasing day by day.Additionally, all his friends are outsiders which is against the policy of the hostel. Moreover, they speak vulgar language which creates an awkward situation for me. Further, they create a lot of disturbance with loud music.

I would appreciate it if you a lot a new room for me and take strict action against them. If you don't take any action, I have to leave the place immediately. My exams are next and I cannot take any risk. I hope you will solve my problem.
I would be thankful to you.

error_list.error_des: The noun phrase vulgar language seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article.
